item.title: Episode 5 - Wagner and the Wolf
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The guys welcome a young lady onto the show. Dina Bedina, the new celebrity correspondent, enters us into the world of notoriety on this edition. Plus...does the world really get less funny the older you are? And fly away with a man who tied balloons to his lawn chair--don't ask, just listen.
